name: Europa Universalis: Rome - Vae Victis
description:
Europa Universalis: Rome - Vae Victis is a strategy game developed by Paradox Interactive. It came out on 19-11-2008. Paradox Interactive published the game. The game is rated as "Meh" on RAWG.
Europa Universalis: Rome - Vae Victis is available on PC.
Johan Andersson produced the game. Andreas Waldetoft scored the game.
